Package com.tombarrasso.android.wp7ui.app Description

This package serves as a simple extension to familiar Android APIs, designed to make the implementation of a "full" Metro UI much easier. Extending from WPActivity instead of Activity will provide more functionality such as menus and a volume panel. In most cases however these effects can be accomplished using newer Fragments APIs.

The developer of this library may be contacted at contact@tombarrasso.com.
